00020 void UserManagement::newUser(User user)
00021 {
00022     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00023     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00024     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Users WHERE Username= :userN");
00025     fetchquery.bindValue(":UserN",user.getUsername());
00026     fetchquery.exec();
00027 
00028     while(fetchquery.next())
00029     {
00030         QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This username exists");
00031         return;
00032     }
00033 
00034     if(UserManagement::checkInData(user))
00035        {
00036          QSqlQuery query;
00037          query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00038          query.prepare("INSERT INTO Users (Name,Surname,Username,Password,Role) VALUES(:name, :surname,:uname,:pass, :role)");
00039          query.bindValue(":name", user.getName());
00040          query.bindValue(":surname",user.getSurname());
00041          query.bindValue(":uname",user.getUsername());
00042          query.bindValue(":pass",user.getPassword());
00043          query.bindValue(":role",user.getRole());
00044          query.exec();
00045         }
00046 }

00094 User UserManagement::fetchUser(QString username)
00095 {
00096     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00097     QString customername,customersurname, cid ("");
00098 
00099     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00100     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Users WHERE Username= :uname");
00101     fetchquery.bindValue(":uname",username);
00102     fetchquery.exec();
00103 
00104     while (fetchquery.next())
00105     {
00106      user.setName(fetchquery.value(1).toString());
00107      user.setSurname(fetchquery.value(2).toString());
00108      user.setUsername(fetchquery.value(3).toString());
00109      user.setPassword(fetchquery.value(4).toString());
00110      user.setRole(fetchquery.value(5).toString());
00111     }
